headline: Kimberly-Clark’s (KMB) Strategic Focus and Financial Updates for 2024
summary: We recently published a list of 10 Consumer Stocks to Buy for a Retirement Portfolio. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Kimberly-Clark Corporation (NYSE:KMB) stands against other consumer stocks to buy for a retirement stock portfolio.
